text: Simone Pontisso (born 20 March 1997) is an Italian footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Vicenza Virtus. ==Club career== Pontisso is a youth exponent from Udinese. He made his Serie A debut at 31 May 2015 against Cagliari Calcio. He replaced Stipe Perica at half-time in a 4–3 away defeat. In July 2016, Pontisso was loaned out to SPAL to play in Serie B.
